one_reviews_text: Essentially this game is a crappy take on the very popular game super hot. But this game is lacking a very critical feature of that game, it is missing the time freeze feature which is in my opinion the most crucial part of the game. in addition to that its execution is terrible with the bots sometimes having aimbot vs them not being able to shoot fish in a barrel. Overall even though it's free don't waste your time on this discount bin of a game.
The game is mediocre but I believe that the devs can become better if they keep trying. But I wouldnt recommend this game

I like the concept of this, but the execution, was terrible.

Probably the worst vr game I've tried.

review_title: The most tedious and mediocre trash.
one_reviews_text: worst VR game ive ever played.
This game is so bad, after playing for 13 minutes i can say this game is garbage.
